title: Omed-omedan (Kissing Festival) (Half-day)
overview: Experience the playful Omed-omedan festival, a unique youth kissing ritual in Denpasar.

stops.description: Arrive and observe the Omed-omedan ritual and festivities.

title: Omed-omedan Ritual & City Tour (Full-day)
overview: A full day exploring the Omed-omedan ritual and Denpasar's cultural sites.

stops.description: Arrive and witness the Omed-omedan ritual.
Participate in a workshop or discussion about Balinese rituals.
